project.description:
This suite will execute ALL of the individual test groups.

MANUAL INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Click 'Build Now' to manually begin a test run.
  • From the list of fields, read their descriptions and set the values appropriate for your testing.
  • Then click the 'Build' button.
  • Then to view the executing tests in live action, click the 'localslave' link in the upper right corner on the building page for further VNC instructions.
